name: To Wake Up From A Dream
name_original: To Wake Up From A Dream
description:
You wake up in your bedroom, but something's strange-- You are locked in. How will you escape? Is everything as it seems? 

Controls:  press 'i' to cycle through inventory items, click to interact with objects, drag to interact with inventory items
